rubric.p: Read and choose the correct options.

block.p: The first “roller coasters” were from Russia. They were slides of ice around 21 meters long. People sat on sleds of wood or ice to ride down them. They landed safely in sand at the bottom. Then, people in warmer places wanted roller coasters. The French made slides from wood and built carts with wheels. They put wax on the wood to make the carts go faster. People in the USA developed metal tracks with more twists and small trains. These are the roller coasters that we like to go on today!
